member.name: T:Jellyfin.Plugin.CableCast.Configuration.PluginConfiguration
member.summary: Plugin configuration.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.CableCast.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.EnableCommercials
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether commercials should be inserted between content.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.CableCast.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.CommercialProbability
member.summary: Gets or sets the commercial insert probability (0.0 to 1.0).

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.CableCast.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.EnablePreRoll
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pre-roll content should be played.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.CableCast.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.MinContentDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum duration in minutes for content to be included in programming.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.CableCast.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.MaxContentDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum duration in minutes for content to be included in programming.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.CableCast.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.ChannelBufferMinutes
member.summary: Gets or sets the channel buffer size in minutes.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.CableCast.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.UseScheduledProgramming
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use schedule-based programming.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.CableCast.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.CommercialLibraryPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the commercial library path for commercial content.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.CableCast.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.PreRollLibraryPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the pre-roll library path for pre-roll content.

member.name: T:Jellyfin.Plugin.CableCast.Controllers.CableCastController
member.summary: API controller for CableCast plugin functionality.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets a specific channel by ID.

member.summary: Creates a new channel.
member.returns: The created channel.

member.summary: Updates an existing channel.

member.summary: Deletes a channel.

member.summary: Gets the current program for a channel.
member.returns: The current program.

member.summary: Gets the schedule for a channel.
member.param: The start time for the schedule (optional, defaults to now).
The number of hours to retrieve (optional, defaults to 24).
member.returns: The channel schedule.

member.summary: Regenerates the schedule for a channel.
member.param: The number of hours to generate (optional, defaults to 24).
member.returns: The regenerated schedule.

member.summary: Gets plugin configuration information.
member.returns: Plugin configuration details.
